capabilities.name: Deliver Results
capabilities.description: Responsible for the delivery of strategic and operational priorities, ensuring conservation and protection of cultural, natural, and historic values.

capabilities.name: Plan and Prioritise
capabilities.description: Coordinates the development and implementation of strategic plans, programs, and operations for the Worimi Conservation Lands.

capabilities.name: Demonstrate Accountability
capabilities.description: Accountable for the quality, integrity, and accuracy of cultural advice, adhering to statutory responsibilities.

capabilities.name: Manage and Develop People
capabilities.description: Provides guidance, mentoring, and support to staff, focusing on cultural leadership and conservation efforts.

capabilities.name: Inspire Direction and Purpose
capabilities.description: Communicates goals and priorities related to the conservation and cultural significance of the Worimi Conservation Lands.

capabilities.name: Manage Reform and Change
capabilities.description: Leads cultural and conservation initiatives, supporting and promoting change within the organization and community.

capabilities.name: Display Resilience and Courage
capabilities.description: Demonstrates openness and honesty in cultural leadership, ready to face challenges in conservation management.

capabilities.name: Act with Integrity
capabilities.description: Upholds ethical standards and public sector values, especially in managing lands of significant Aboriginal cultural heritage.

capabilities.name: Value Diversity
capabilities.description: Shows respect for diverse backgrounds, especially in recognizing the cultural significance of the Worimi Conservation Lands to the Worimi People.

capabilities.name: Work Collaboratively
capabilities.description: Collaborates with the Worimi Conservation Lands Board, community, and staff, valuing their contributions to conservation efforts.

capabilities.name: Influence and Negotiate
capabilities.description: Engages with various stakeholders to gain consensus and commitment towards the conservation and cultural priorities of the Worimi Conservation Lands.

capabilities.name: Project Management
capabilities.description: Applies effective planning, coordination, and control methods to conservation projects and initiatives.

skills.name: Cultural Leadership
skills.description: Leading with a focus on cultural priorities, ensuring the protection of cultural, natural, and historic values.

skills.name: Strategic Planning
skills.description: Developing and implementing strategic plans for the conservation and management of the Worimi Conservation Lands.

skills.name: Stakeholder Engagement
skills.description: Engaging with the community, Traditional Owners, and other stakeholders to support conservation efforts.

skills.name: Conservation Techniques
skills.description: Applying knowledge of conservation practices to protect and manage natural and cultural heritage.

generalRole.title: Cultural and Environmental Conservation Manager
generalRole.description: This role involves leading the conservation and management of natural, cultural, and historic values within a significant Aboriginal joint-managed park, focusing on strategic planning, stakeholder engagement, and cultural leadership.
